attributes.action: move to exlude Bishops or any representative of religious institutions from the House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is a secular country, and whilst we retain an archaic upper house it should be somewhat representative of the peoples political opinions. To have religious leaders in positions of political leadership in a secular democracy is unacceptable, and something that has come to the forefront of the nations consciousness in light of the actions of Dr Rowan Williams in regard to the use of aspects of Sharia law within the British system. We demand that religious leaders are removed from our government with immediate effect.

government_responses.details:
